--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> I was just wondering if anyone in the group knows about the 
release 
> of the OST for PMK? What do you think of it? A singaporean friend 
> sent me a some songs and my favorite one (aside from the 
> opening/closing) is either Sorezore no Hisou or Asamoya no Naka de 
> (can't decide yet). I think both though was played during episodes 
> 18-19 the time of Ayu-nee's capture and death. I'm no fan of 
> instrumentals (aside from some of the Kenshin ones), but I think 
> it's a good change.

Hmmm... I decided to upload a sampling of the album for evaluation 
purposes only. Here's the link. Any comments? I'd love to hear from 
you.. The original album said something like Nipponsei... It has 32 
songs... All instrumental except for the opening/ending song... Each 
lasting 2-3 minutes...
